Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower®.
We are here to help you take the first steps, but we might have the wrong telephone number.
The number that we have on file is {!Lead.Phone}. Please give us a call at 1-844-877-8676 (1-844-US-SUNPOWER) to update your information, or reply to this email with your phone number and a good time to contact you.
In the meantime, we invite you to learn a bit more about SunPower® home solar and how it’s transforming the way people generate the clean, renewable energy they need every day.
Visit the SunPower Community and learn what others are saying about their switch to home solar. Check out our Refer-a-Friend program to help spread the good word about solar. If your referral buys or leases a home solar system, you’ll earn a $500 VISA Reward Card1 from SunPower.
More in-depth solar information can be found at the following links:

We look forward to hearing from you.
